solutionExplanation: Between Step: #1 and #2, Amy could have made 'MultiplyTermsWhenAnotherOperationHasPrecedent' mistake and computed multiplication before calculating '2' the power of '3'. She could have also used 'CombineLikeVariables' to combine '3x-2x'. For the next selection option, Amy used 'CombineLikeVariables' to compute '3x-2x' while none of the card operations were possible for the last selection option.
